subtitle: A selection of projects I've designed and developed

projects.title: MEDCOMPARE – AI Powered Medication Data Benchmarking Tool
projects.description: Built a real-time Streamlit tool benchmarking medication data from LLMs using semantic similarity, fuzzy matching, and biostatistics; aligned outputs with FDA and RxNorm standards; supported batch evaluation, scoring, and FHIR exports for clinical review.

projects.title: Classification with XGBoost + ONNX Deployment
projects.description: Developed an XGBoost classifier on 1.2M entries, outperforming baselines; applied scaling, outlier handling, and data prep; converted model to ONNX for real-time edge/cloud deployment, showcasing scalable predictive analytics in IoT and embedded environments.

projects.title: Financial Advisor LLM
projects.description: An AI-powered financial advisory application leveraging Large Language Models to provide intelligent financial guidance and analysis using modern NLP techniques.

projects.title: YOLOv10 – Real-Time Object Detection
projects.description: Implementation and experimentation with YOLOv10, a state-of-the-art real-time object detection model. Features containerized deployment with Docker for scalable inference pipelines.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Web App with SageMaker
projects.description: End-to-end sentiment analysis web application deployed using AWS SageMaker. Combines a trained ML model with a web interface for real-time text sentiment prediction at scale.

projects.title: Text Analysis Using NLP & Streamlit
projects.description: An interactive NLP-powered text analysis application built with Streamlit. Provides text processing, entity extraction, and linguistic analysis through an intuitive web interface.

projects.title: Fraud Detection Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Machine learning pipeline for detecting fraudulent transactions. Implements data preprocessing, feature engineering, and classification models to identify anomalous financial activity.

projects.title: Model Interpretability for ML Models
projects.description: Exploring interpretability and explainability techniques for machine learning models. Implements SHAP, LIME, and other XAI methods to understand and visualize model decision-making.

projects.title: Brain Mapping – EEG Signal Classification
projects.description: Brain mapping using EEG signal classification with 2D Discrete Wavelet Transform and pattern matching for normal/abnormal EEG classification. A biomedical signal processing implementation.
